anatomicalAxesOrientation._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (stated as XYZ) for this custom coordinate space.

axesOrigin._instruction: Enter the origin of this custom coordinate space (central point where axes intersect; 2D: [x, y] or 3D:[x, y, z]).

defaultImage._instruction: Add one or several image files used as visual representation of this custom coordinate space.

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this custom coordinate space.

nativeUnit._instruction: Add the native unit that is used for this custom coordinate space.
